Reviews.Title: “Awful”

Reviews.Content: booked hotel online arrived dog tired 5 am receptionist couple minutes look denied received booking confirmation accepted instead offered suite extra 75 afternoon accepted getting copies ids girl walked information desk keys real quick rude hand motion supposed suite walked thoght suite exact booked didnt downstairs tired afternoon check speak manager waiting 15 mins actually received booking apologised behaviour receptionist deceptive offered stay night apology useless

Reviews.Title: “Great service”
Reviews.Author: Amir-traveller
Reviews.Content: hotel equipped service excellent satisfy arrive hotel time welcome glass orange juice towel dry sweat free internet available lobby dubai 7 mins walk metro station located business district main malls beaches attracions 30 mins taxi peak hour traffic metro bus shuttles nearest famous shopping mall deira city center hotel shuttle walk 20 mins walk guest dont worry additional costs hotels hotel welcome guests pay additional costs dry hotel doesnt night club looking near hotels hilton moscow wich couple minutes walk

Reviews.Title: “Overrated and overpriced”
Reviews.Author: Rutilante
Reviews.Content: choose hotel trying close vacation nice we´ve found trip skipped service twice warm water trainees restaurant concierges drove extra mile helped luggage sent kuwait delayed customs don´t sell alcohol beer hilton door pay bottle champagne atractions maybe fr business

Reviews.Title: “Nice clean hotel, close to mall”
Reviews.Author: giraffez
Reviews.Content: hotel nice clean close deira shopping centre walkable major traffic intersection cross 12km taxi plenty reasonably cheap dubai mall 15 minutes car clean bed comfy hotel wifi internet lobby connection slow wide selection food breakfast dont forget try spread yummy beef muslim country bacon beef swimming pool top heated outside pool top level night night view dubai bank close money exchange bring own hairdryer hairdryer weak quicker leaving hair dry naturally hotel 5 star plate 5 stars outside entrance
